item.title: New paper: Pre-service teachers' dual perspectives on generative AI: Benefits, challenges, and integrating into teaching and learning
item.description: Background: Jaesung Hur and colleagues recently co-authored an article titled “Pre-service teachers’ dual perspectives on generative AI: Benefits, challenges, and integrating into teaching and learning” in Online Learning. Abstract: This study examined pre-service teachers’ perspectives on integrating generative AI (GenAI) tools into their own learning and teaching practices. Discussion posts from asynchronous online courses on ChatGPT were analyzed using the Diffusion of Innovations framework to explore familiarity, willingness to apply ChatGPT to instruction, potential benefits, challenges, and concerns about using GenAI in teaching and learning.
